Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Murphy's Imports is a modestly decorated shop, with a counter to the north for sales transactions, and a seating area to the south. The seating area has two solid wood tables to either side of a red leather couch, with a matching chair. A corner shelf is tucked neatly in the northwest corner of the room. A bordered cherry-red and burgundy area rug takes up most of the floor in this space, it looks quite used. Two windows in the east wall let in a bit of light as well as a few oil lamps that are built in. You can see a few wooden toys and dolls left carelessly around the room.

Murphy's Imports is a modestly decorated shop, with a counter to the north for sales transactions, and a seating area to the south. The seating area has two solid wood tables to either side of a red leather couch, with a matching chair. A corner shelf is tucked neatly in the northwest corner of the room. A bordered cherry-red and burgundy area rug takes up most of the floor in this space, it looks quite used. Two windows in the east wall let in a bit of light as well as a few oil lamps that are built in. You can see a few wooden toys and dolls left carelessly around the room.

Murphy's Imports is a modestly decorated shop, with a counter to the north for sales transactions, and a seating area to the south. The seating area has two solid wood tables to either side of a red leather couch, with a matching chair. A corner shelf is tucked neatly in the northwest corner of the room. A bordered cherry-red and burgundy area rug takes up most of the floor in this space, it looks quite used. Two windows in the east wall let in a bit of light as well as a few oil lamps that are built in. You can see a few wooden toys and dolls left carelessly around the room.
a carved wooden door leading north
A carved wooden door leading out to the north. $(parent-desc)
A corner shelf is tucked neatly in the northwest corner of the room, it holds a few books and skeins of yarn.
A corner shelf is tucked neatly in the northwest corner of the room, it holds a few books and skeins of yarn.
A variety of wooden toys, and dolls are carelessly left around the room suggesting a fair amount of children come in and out of the shop.
Wooden toys, and dolls are carelessly left around the room.

The gray stone eastern wall was laid on a base of peastone gravel which fills a twenty-one inch trench. The larger blocks are placed at the bottom and the lesser stones set upon those. For stability, the higher stones slant towards the center, therefore it is thinner near the ceiling. All the cracks and crevices are filled with minor stones and gravel to complete the wall and prevent light or weather from filtering through. The wall is approximately ten feet in height. There are two arched windows.

The gray stone eastern wall was laid on a base of peastone gravel which fills a twenty-one inch trench. The larger blocks are placed at the bottom and the lesser stones set upon those. The wall is approximately ten feet in height. There are two arched windows.
Each window is symmetrically placed about a fourth of the way in the wall. The arched windows allow for a great deal of natural light during the day. Through the windows:
Two arched windows are symmetrically build into the east wall and lend a great deal of natural light to the shop in the day. Through the window:

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ A slim red-haired woman adjusts the clothing on \{ an oak male mannequin \| an oak dress form \} before returning to a solid maple stool to work on some sewing. \| Two young children argue over some toys before running out of the shop to wrestle outside. \| A young child puts \{ her \| his \} hands on their hips and confidently tells a slim red-haired woman, \{ "When I grow up, I want to sew clothes, too!" \| "I don't want to take a bath!" \| "I think we should have pudding for dinner." \| "You work far too hard, mother." \} \| A slim red-haired woman watches you as she carefully cuts out a length of fabric. \| Some young children argue over a doll before a slim red-haired woman quiets them with one stern glance. \| A slim red-haired woman instructs her children on the importance of labor, "We live to work, not the other way around." \| A slim red-haired woman takes a break from her work to scrub a stain out of a cherry-red and burgundy bordered area rug. \| A slim red-haired woman stretches her back. \| A stooped elderly man clears his throat gruffly, eyeing the children with a stern look as they sheepishly hang their heads. \| A stooped elderly man briefly slouches, appearing to fall asleep on the couch before he startles the children into a fit of laughter with a loud roar. \| A stooped elderly man invites the children over, perching one on each knee for a whispering tale. \| A stooped elderly man briefly coughs into his handkerchief, sitting back with a soft groan. \}
